rooms.description: Large foyer with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light and views of the courtyard.
Spacious contemporary living area integrated with an open-plan design featuring floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the central courtyard.
Adjacent to the living room with modern fixtures and ambient lighting; aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Modern open kitchen design featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to capture light from the courtyard. Efficient layout adheres to local building norms and Vastu for auspicious placement.
Accessible guest toilet near entrance, ensuring easy access and Vastu compliance.

openings.position: Center of house, connecting all levels
openings.description: Central courtyard provides natural light and ventilation across the floors

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed for privacy. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows facing the courtyard.
Contemporary bedroom space with built-in storage solutions, floor-to-ceiling window integration for ample natural light.
Additional bedroom designed to cater to family needs, with efficient layout and Vastu-aligned window placement.

Dedicated library space integrated into the upper floor design featuring built-in bookshelves and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Positioned to promote positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Private bathroom adjoining master bedroom with modern fixtures and Vastu compliant layout.

openings.description: Connecting lower and upper floors, designed to ensure seamless movement while preserving structural integrity.

rooms.description: Multi-functional study space in the split-level design, incorporating natural light and open access to the courtyard. Designed with Vastu principles for concentration.
Additional storage space integrated within the mezzanine level, ensuring efficient use of vertical space and adherence to local building norms.
